bow: feeling shamed by single friends hope this is an acceptable place to post this can find anywhere on the internet that reflects what about to say oddly have no friends who are fellow parents of my single friends many have begun adopting antinatalist philosophies the view that it wrong to have children they will sit in my house and share these views and then add as an afterthought oh not you though don mean to shame people who do have children well yes they do though as the movement is founded on moral grounds that appears to be the entire point it hard enough as mother to be judged for every microdecision of parenting now the shaming of mothers is taken even further to me this is anti feminist to the core ve been reading about it everywhere go online as well guess lot of my hobbies and interests like art are not shared by parents but rather by childfree people that in itself is not an issue to me at all but it sucks to have people who thought were my friends or peers essentially telling me my life is morally wrong it has me feeling very isolated and guess just hope there is someone out there who can relate sorry they ve treated you like that they say things like that trying to start an argument so they can feel superior because they are fighting against something after becoming mom dumped lot of friends people can be shitty and there no room for that crap in my life finding other parents to be friends with can be hard though hope happier stuff comes your way soon they do not sound like friends sorry would definitely tell friends that you ve heard these comments from them lot and it is highly offensive tell them you made choice to have children and you re very happy with that choice them not supporting you since they re friends makes you feel awful and you want to know why they continue to do this all friend are going to say something that hurts you at some point unfortunately you will also hurt your friends we re human but you should also be able to say your comments hurt me please stop and support me as your friends they should be able to do that you being mom is at the core of who you are now they should stand behind that and stop belittling it would tell my friends how feel about it and ask them to chill out and stop talking about that around me we lost one friend but tbh it does really feel like loss at all completely agree with the other commenters who say these people don really sound like the sort of people would want in my life or my child life that being said if you want to keep these people in your life think you need to explain to them how you are feeling if this was me would say something along the lines of totally understand if you do not want children or see them in your future that is your right in the same way it is my right to have children if you want to be continue to be part of my life then you need to be able more respectful of my life and my choices as at the moment your comments are detrimental to my wellbeing ultimately you have to do what is best for you and your little one and you re the only one that knows what that is if you are struggling to find mummy friends can you check any community centres or churches in your area as they normally have toddler groups where you can meet other mums was gon na ask what feminism had to do with this then answered my own question amp x200b feminism is about having the ability to choose what to do with your life as woman and being respected for it anyone who believes that having children is somehow morally wrong is an insane person conservative so this is obvious to me but it sounds like you might still be on the sinking ship of progressivism so maybe you have considered it these people are mentally unwell leftist ideologies have driven them off the deep end it only going to get worse suggest you take long hard look at yourself and your values and reconsider things in light of being new parent within reason though right mean some women choose to have multiple children by different men do drugs neglect their kids and live off the government lot of women actually so you ca respect them just because they re women right it sounds like you re in need of solid network of parents who have like you managed to also maintain their interests and sense of self it sad to hear you say that liking art and having rich set of hobbies and passions is just for child free people promise that not true work in an art museum and our hip curators and educators like me ha jk are also parents we take our kids to museums sure but we also go alone one of my best friends became major award winning journalist \*after\* her child was born she never done journalism before he was born and what she reports on usually has nothing to do with motherhood which only mention because sometimes women are expected to stay in that lane once they become mothers amp x200b have you looked into options like meetup for parents in your area who like to hike go to museums etc etc it may be worth checking your local area for opportunities like that sure they may not become your best friends but then again they might amp x200b also major environmentalist and deeply concerned about the consequences of overpopulation and the burden on our planet also parent totally empathize with the idea that having kids contributes to these pressing issues but to truly look at how we can be most effective at limiting the damage to our planet the answer lies with governments and major corporations they ve held on to the power that lets them exploit our resources and pollute with impunity and holding them accountable is urgent \*now\* hope your friends know this and are voting calling their reps marching writing letters and willing to chain themselves to stuff otherwise it not only anti feminist but pretty classist to place the burden for change on those with the least power to impact our current course amp x200b rant over think its more in regards to career kids vs sahm honestly you have no idea how much your comment means to me completely agree overpopulation is an issue but not in the ways most people seem to think all the humans on the planet standing shoulder to shoulder could fit in la there is actually enough food for everyone too it the distribution that the problem billionaires stockpiling resources and corporations lobbying for even more ways to screw our planet is doing far more harm than raising couple of children would also we don know what we don know there could be baby born this very minute who may grow up to single handedly reverse climate change or cure disease of course there are million other issues but there are possible solutions to each it seems that the people who rant about overpopulation haven done any research on it it shouldn bother me because know they are ignorant yet it does did not go to university until after had children graduated with degree in anthropology and psychology and now actually full time mother and painter what odd is that live in salt lake city originally from ny and don have mom friends or artist friends my online presence has almost nothing to do with children interact digitally only with other artists it seems hardly any of them have children sometimes it feels there no one out there that does the same combination of things do it sounds so silly thank goodness for my husband who is my best friend we have tried to make friends here but it really difficult since we are not part of the religion that makes up most of the state maybe we just need to move lol thank you for sharing your thoughts it warms my heart to even hear about someone else with similar interests making it all happen with children hahaha you are right am still on that sinking ship my opinions on equality economics healthcare are likely more leftist than yours but feel very alienated from progressives guess in the no man land of reason identity politics and virtue signaling are undermining everything believe in love to talk to you more about this also not exactly new parent can see how my post would sound that way but have kids some in school just been struggling with this for while lol yes work freelance from home so most people view me as just sahm am feminist but most other feminists make subtle yet pervasive remarks disparaging sahms nearly constantly its the one form of unconscious bias that no one seems to talk about get dirty looks when simply walk into restaurant with children god forbid my child laughs too loud and ruins someones dinner it incredibly disheartening as woman sometimes it seems we are damned if we do and damned if we don in regards to so many aspects of life trying and failing to build thicker skin and not care as much exactly didn exactly make that connection clear in my post but glad you read between the lines lol thank you my dear hope so too it really is hard to find family friends isn it no problem you are totally right guess never want them to think just another conformist who pressures them to have kids it seems that all they hear when anyone questions any aspect of these views don care whatsoever whether they have kids just want to be respected for my own decision to have them ve tried to make point to not be the person that has kids and then disappears but it lot harder than ever imagined it would be not even new parent just been struggling with this for while thank you you are right of course need to put myself out there more it complicates things lot that in salt lake city and not part of the quite exclusive religion most families here adhere to there have got to be other families like us though right 🤷‍♀️😅 haha understand sounds very different to my wee scottish town most of our baby groups are run by the local church but non christians and christians alike all go it lovely it is really tough to try and find new friend support group was in similar situation no friends with children and it took until my daughter was months for me to regularly get out to groups found what helped me was my mum coming along with me the first few times and wasn as anxious after that have you got local library that does book readings or nursery rhyme sessions hope you don mind the advice just hate to think of people feeling lonely in an already difficult time gee glad you showed up to let us all know who you think we all should or shouldn respect single moms deserve our support women who struggle with drug addiction deserve our support women who are unemployed disabled or otherwise unable to work deserve our support but yes women who are abusive to children do not deserve our support good point sure everyone was very confused about why we would support child abusers when we said we support women right to choose what best for her and her family oh so it almost like they need to overcompensate for this alternative lifestyle yes you re not alone catholic from san francisco ca low share of children comparably in the us and get this attitude being new parent hi live in slc ha love it here there is such great access to cool things but it stays great kept secret because the overriding culture gets most of the attention feel free to dm me yeah can see how your position might be tough here in salt lake city it pretty conservative and mormon neither but also have pretty traditional values in other ways these days everything is so polarized that it tricky for reasonable people like you and to do our own thing it didn used to be that big of deal good luck on being new parent have children and they are pure joy ha awesome ve been here years and still feel new here not on fb probably part of my problem actually but on instagram anastasia rath but ll also dm you later yay grew up here lived elsewhere for bit and came back and still usually feel like an outsider glad to know you wanted to be like that before kids but for me what wanted changed what want now is to be able to hang out with people with my children to have friends that are ok with only seeing me once every month or two friends that are ok doing something mundane bc ca leave the house right now want people to invite me even if ca go want to feel included want friends that will grow with my family **is it possible that what you want now is connection your current friends ca give you ** know what want has changed but am still willing to put effort into my friends but those friends of mine who did reciprocate this is the important part are the ones that did the disappearing not me it does hurt little bit but maybe in the future we will connect again for now do want to put energy into something that not working when we found couple friends that actually liked kids we found it refreshing we really enjoy hanging out with them and it made us feel so much more confident in where we chose to place our priorities those friends sound like dicks not just to you but in general meh suggest simply stating to them that you ve been having tough time and really desperately need to surround yourself with positivity no need to go into details it just like saying feel really sluggish so gon na start working out and eating healthy well little further south from you in riverton and am part of that exclusive religion and be happy to be your friend surrounded by people of my own beliefs and have still found it difficult to make friends sahm feminist artist many other things to fill up my time ll hang with you ❤️ the only one of my friends who has had child my group of friends consists of about 10 women ve known since childhood there are several women in that group who are single and now firmly in the childfree camp they often say insulting things about having children and being married honestly they use those types of anti establishment comments as defense for their lifestyle choices mean how can they really judge what it is to be married and have children if they haven done either so don take it personally they are entitled to their opinions and those opinions have no affect on how live my life and vice versa for now our lifestyles are mostly incompatible and hope that in time our paths will come closer together again and we can share more together when you ve been friends this long it more like family our day to day struggles are very different but in the end we ll be there for each other when it counts removed removed said this in another comment but shaming is toxic shaming is toxic do care what they believe if they re shaming you and see nothing wrong with it they need to go find new friends ones who respect your choices even if they disagree with them and stick with them you ll find yourself wondering why you did do it sooner care bad bot removed was shamed by friend for not choosing adoption or taking in foster child and pursuing ivf instead she is no longer my friend she does believe my children should exist so have problem with that and with her at some point you need to cut ties with people and spend time with your family only or make new friends you could say understand parenthood isn for everyone imagine if your parents felt that way also anyone who says those things to new mother— or any mother— are not real friends am sorry go to your local library story time or find meet up etc to find other parents is it possible that nobody ever wanted to marry them think this is great advice hope op follows it always say not baby person well wanted kids so had to have the babies first commend some of my fiends for hanging out with me and my babies if love you ll also hang out with your babies if we aren that close want nothing to do with your babies find people who also enjoy hanging out with kids it not for everyone it mixture of poor partner choices and thinking they would always have more time unfortunately once your in your 30s partying nonstop just isn cute anymore for some of them it was shitty circumstances miscarriages and failed long term relationships by having reasons for being single and childfree outside of those personal tragedies it gives them defense greater than themselves don get me wrong any woman should have the right to decide for herself if she gets married and if she has children but when women feel it necessary to belittle women who do want those things it probably more of personal issue they don want to face think you re right do see the endless bad choices with men for some of those women removed what kind thing to say thank you my dear let be friends when first moved here was actually stoked to hang out with mormons because always love mixing with people who are different from me there is also something to learn however quickly got the impression that mormons weren so stoked to hang out with me this was before kids now it seems even more acute actually worried that my daughter will be excluded from certain social events with school friends couple kids in her kindergarten class have had birthday parties where half the class got invited suspect the church friends and it hard to know where the line is don want to make anyone uncomfortable sure overthinking this but maybe you can be my insider 😂😭 that really sounds heavenly ll just move to scotland actually any excuse is welcome in all seriousness though these are great suggestions need to get over some of my social fears and just join more family friendly group of some kind thank you it is mind boggling position isn it it makes me want to call up their mothers 😂😭 that is just awful what deeply personal thing to stick their nose into wow and it very classist don know your situation but likely wouldn have been approved to adopt baby at the time had my first child and yet she and the others have been very well taken care of better than was even and consider my childhood to be good one it very difficult to adopt and has its own issues obviously it commendable to do but how could anyone suggest it akin to mandatory you re right think people don even realize what they are saying in terms of what it might mean from my perspective but that may show that their place in life is just too different from mine not to say only want to mingle with people just like myself but this is season of life where adult social time is highly limited need to make better use of it yesss be my friend it like unconscious dickliness which is maybe the worst kind upon further reflection 😂😭 grateful for you sharing your situation it very similar to mine always find it interesting how my childfree friends seem to view marriage and children they have lot of false assumptions also they have this air of smugness like they really know what up while ve fallen prey to some conformist cycle in reality the only one with information about both lifestyles having previously been single and childfree even saying didn want children for awhile know about that lifestyle and know about my current one they only know about one maybe that why it so maddening there is no way for me to say this to them without sounding like total jerk but just swallowing their casual side comments suuuucks grateful for you sharing your situation it very similar to mine always find it interesting how my childfree friends seem to view marriage and children they have lot of false assumptions also they have this air of smugness like they really know what up while ve fallen prey to some conformist cycle in reality the only one with information about both lifestyles having previously been single and childfree even saying didn want children for awhile know about that lifestyle and know about my current one they only know about one maybe that why it so maddening there is no way for me to say this to them without sounding like total jerk but just swallowing their casual side comments suuuucks that good point certainly not for all child free women but definitely for some it seems like they feel an offense is the best defense guess all people do it to some extent spending the rest of their lives justifying their own decisions of the past it pretty obvious when someone is doing it once you ve seen it few times you know you are right would never write someone off because they don have kids but have found that some types of interactions have become one sided it unsatisfying to vent about kid stuff to them because they don understand but they can vent to me about dating woes and give them the response they want have experienced those things myself over time it does add up to connection that seems fine on the surface but in reality only serves ones of us would looooove to find good couples with children friend that sounds like heaven the best people can be in totally different places in life and still respect you hope you re able to find them
